author: seelmann
msg: Removed embedded hbase since it is useless. Fixed tests, basic tests are working now.

author: markt
msg: Only try and create the dir if it doesn't already exist

author: kbrand
msg: Enforce OpenSSL 0.9.7 as a minimum requirement in configure, and
remove #ifdef'ed code which was relevant for earlier versions only.

author: kbrand
msg: Remove the ssl_toolkit_compat layer, which is no longer needed
after support for non-OpenSSL toolkits has been dropped.
Replace macros by their value proper where feasible, and keep
those definitions in ssl_private.h which depend on specific

author: rfscholte
msg: Use canonicalPath for localRepo in test to please Jenkins on ubuntu
